title: naaradha gaana lOla
sahitya:
nArada gAnalOla natajana paripAla



anupallavi



 nIrada sama nIla nirupama guNa shIla



caraNam



 nIvu lEka E tanuvulu niratamugA naDucunu nIvu lEka E taruvulu nikkamugA molucunu 

nIvu lEka E vAnalu nityamugA gurucunu nIvu lEka tyAgarAju nI guNamula nETu bADunu
